title: Chapter 4550 - Chapter 4550: 4549 Exterminating The Evil Sequence Camp 15
body:
Chapter 4550 - Chapter 4550: 4549 Exterminating The Evil Sequence Camp 15

Chapter 4550: 4549 exterminating the evil sequence camp 15

They were defeated, completely defeated!

The Lord of Disaster, the Axe Sword Demon, and the old man in the bamboo hat had already given up on the idea of killing the Dragon King.

Now, the only way to escape was to escape!

They looked at each other and moved. Without any hesitation, they took out an escape treasure and instantly disappeared from the starry sky!

When Wang Xian saw that they were fleeing, he was stunned for a moment before a smile appeared on his face.

“Now that you want to escape, can you escape?”

Wang Xian moved and locked onto them. He then opened the Netherdragon’s Pursuit Channel.

Buzz! Buzz! Buzz

At the same time, in an area extremely far away from the evil sequence universe.

The Lord of disaster and the rest appeared.

“Keep running. We can’t separate yet. If we do, we’ll be killed by his curses one by one!”

The old man wearing the bamboo hat said to disaster master and the others with an ugly expression.

Disaster Master and the others nodded.

In the current situation, they could only run away together.

If one of them was cursed, they could help each other.

The three of them fled into the distance with unsightly expressions.

However, at this moment, a black hole appeared not far away from them.

The figures of Wang Xian and the Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens appeared.

“Hehe!”

Looking at the Lord of Calamity and the other two, a mocking expression appeared on Wang Xian’s face.

He moved and chased after them easily.

Moreover, the thousand tentacles curse was still going on.

“Not good. The Dragon King is chasing after us.”

At this moment, the Lord of calamity also sensed the presence of Wang Xian and the rest. His expression changed slightly as he growled in a low voice.

“I have a treasure that can instantly distance us from a great distance. I can bring all of you along!”

Sword Demon Axe’s gaze focused as he spoke loudly!

As he spoke, he took out a scroll and opened it. A Ray of light enveloped them.

The figures of the three of them continued to disappear!

Wang Xian looked over and continued to open a passageway.

Buzz! Buzz! Buzz

Buzz! Buzz

This time, axe sword demon led the Lord of Calamity and the rest to a very distant location.

However, two seconds after they appeared, Wang Xian’s figure appeared once again at the side!

“Dragon King, are you going to fight us to the death?”

Seeing Wang Xian chasing after them again, sword demon axe roared with bloodshot eyes!

“I’m going to destroy all of you!”

Wang Xian replied calmly and replied indifferently!

“We have treasures to escape, and he has a way to chase after us. However, I don’t believe that he can keep chasing after us!”

The old man with the bamboo hat roared in disbelief.

He took out a treasure and led the Lord of disaster and the others away once again!

However, a few seconds later, they saw that Wang Xian was still following behind them. He was looking at them with a smile on his face.

“Huff! Huff!”

This caused the lord of disaster and the others to breathe slightly faster.

“Continue!”

They roared loudly.

As the strongest existences in the evil sequence faction, they had all sorts of powerful trump cards and treasures.

There were many kinds of escaping treasures.

He took out another treasure and continued to escape.

However, Wang Xian still followed them easily and gave chase at a steady pace.

After more than ten consecutive attempts, Wang Xian was able to follow behind them.

“I’ve used up all the treasures on me.”

“I’ve used up mine as well!”

After more than ten consecutive attempts to escape, all the escaping treasures in the hands of the Lord of Calamity and the others had been used up.

Although they still had many escape treasures, those treasures could only allow one of them to escape.

They had used up all the escape treasures in an area.

As for escaping alone?

Escaping alone would only speed up their deaths.

They had to escape together.

“I know a place that has a long-distance chaotic black hole. Let’s see if we can get rid of this Dragon King There!”

The old man wearing the bamboo hat roared with his blood-red eyes!

“Is the distance far? How long will it take us to get there?”

Sword Demon Axe asked.

“A thousand years of distance. With our strength, we can hold on until then!”

The old man wearing the bamboo hat replied!

“Alright, let’s Go!”

The Lord of disaster and the others had no other choice but to answer.

They flew into the distance.

With the existence of a strong vitality, they immediately used up their vitality and fled quickly.

Wang Xian followed behind them calmly.

It was impossible for the other party to get rid of his pursuit.

He was neither too fast nor too slow. He wanted to kill thousand tentacles first!

At the same time, thousand tentacles was suffering from a terrifying curse.

He wanted to get rid of it, but no matter what method he used, the curse would enter his main body.

He couldn’t get rid of it at all.

He frantically sent a message to the Lord of disaster and the others.

But now, the message he sent didn’t receive any response!

“I’ve been abandoned by them. Am I going to be completely destroyed? I can’t accept this. I don’t want to Die!”

Thousand Tentacles roared in despair.

His body was filled with cracks as he desperately resisted.

However, the difference in strength allowed him to clearly feel that his doomsday was coming!

Twenty minutes quickly passed.

Thousand Tentacles smiled miserably. This body was dead.

A few seconds later, he resurrected in another place.

After resurrecting, he felt his body with great anxiety.

He prayed that he would not be cursed again.

However, when the curse came, he was completely in despair.

“I didn’t expect that I would die after cultivating to the primal Chaos Realm!”

“Dragon King, Dragon King!”

Thousand Tentacles went mad and roared crazily.

He had already fallen into the primal chaos realm. Facing the curse again, he could not even last a few minutes!

In the following time, thousand tentacles resurrected and died!

Endless curses and endless deaths began.

Half an hour later, thousand tentacles’last corpse died.

From then on, the most terrifying top-tier expert of the evil sequence camp, thousand tentacles, the demon whose hands were stained with countless fresh blood, died completely!

He died completely!

“Thousand tentacles is dead, completely dead!”

The Lord of disaster and the rest felt something in their hearts and roared in grief and indignation.

They felt like a fox mourning the death of a rabbit!

“Yes, thousand tentacles is dead. It’s your turn now.”

Wang Xian completely killed thousand tentacles.

He stretched his body and accelerated his speed abruptly. He arrived in front of the Lord of disaster and spoke with a cold expression!

Next, it was their turn!

“Go All Out, Charge!”

The Lord of Disaster and the rest roared crazily. The three of them gathered together and condensed a terrifying energy to attack in front of them.

They gave up on their defense and attacked with all their might!

They wanted to break through all the obstacles in their way.

Boom! Boom! Boom

Boom! Boom

Wang Xian attacked immediately. The Divine Roc of the Nine Heavens also attacked them!
